00054 enum vvp_io_subtype {
00056         IO_NORMAL,
00058         IO_SPLICE,
00059 };

00064 struct vvp_io {
00066         struct cl_io_slice     vui_cl;
00067         struct cl_io_lock_link vui_link;
00071         struct iov_iter *vui_iter;
00072 #ifndef HAVE_FILE_OPERATIONS_READ_WRITE_ITER
00073 
00076         unsigned long vui_tot_nrsegs;
00080         size_t vui_iov_olen;
00081 #endif /* !HAVE_FILE_OPERATIONS_READ_WRITE_ITER */
00082 
00085         size_t vui_tot_count;
00086 
00087         union {
00088                 struct vvp_fault_io {
00093                         time_t                   ft_mtime;
00094                         struct vm_area_struct   *ft_vma;
00098                         struct page             *ft_vmpage;
00102                         struct vm_fault         *ft_vmf;
00106                         unsigned int             ft_flags;
00110                         bool                     ft_flags_valid;
00111                 } fault;
00112                 struct {
00113                         struct pipe_inode_info  *vui_pipe;
00114                         unsigned int             vui_flags;
00115                 } splice;
00116                 struct {
00117                         struct cl_page_list vui_queue;
00118                         unsigned long vui_written;
00119                         int vui_from;
00120                         int vui_to;
00121                 } write;
00122         } u;
00123 
00124         enum vvp_io_subtype     vui_io_subtype;
00125 
00129         __u32                   vui_layout_gen;
00133         struct ll_file_data     *vui_fd;
00134         struct kiocb            *vui_iocb;
00135 
00136         /* Readahead state. */
00137         pgoff_t vui_ra_start;
00138         pgoff_t vui_ra_count;
00139         /* Set when vui_ra_{start,count} have been initialized. */
00140         bool            vui_ra_valid;
00141 };

00145 extern struct lu_context_key vvp_session_key;
00146 extern struct lu_context_key vvp_thread_key;

00149 extern struct kmem_cache *vvp_object_kmem;

00151 struct vvp_thread_info {
00152         struct cl_lock          vti_lock;
00153         struct cl_lock_descr    vti_descr;
00154         struct cl_io            vti_io;
00155         struct cl_attr          vti_attr;
00156 };
00157 
00158 static inline struct vvp_thread_info *vvp_env_info(const struct lu_env *env)
00159 {
00160         struct vvp_thread_info *vti;
00161 
00162         vti = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &vvp_thread_key);
00163         LASSERT(vti != NULL);
00164 
00165         return vti;
00166 }
00167 
00168 static inline struct cl_lock *vvp_env_lock(const struct lu_env *env)
00169 {
00170         struct cl_lock *lock = &vvp_env_info(env)->vti_lock;
00171 
00172         memset(lock, 0, sizeof(*lock));
00173 
00174         return lock;
00175 }
00176 
00177 static inline struct cl_attr *vvp_env_thread_attr(const struct lu_env *env)
00178 {
00179         struct cl_attr *attr = &vvp_env_info(env)->vti_attr;
00180 
00181         memset(attr, 0, sizeof(*attr));
00182 
00183         return attr;
00184 }
00185 
00186 static inline struct cl_io *vvp_env_thread_io(const struct lu_env *env)
00187 {
00188         struct cl_io *io = &vvp_env_info(env)->vti_io;
00189 
00190         memset(io, 0, sizeof(*io));
00191 
00192         return io;
00193 }
00194 
00195 struct vvp_session {
00196         struct vvp_io vs_ios;
00197 };
00198 
00199 static inline struct vvp_session *vvp_env_session(const struct lu_env *env)
00200 {
00201         struct vvp_session *ses;
00202 
00203         ses = lu_context_key_get(env->le_ses, &vvp_session_key);
00204         LASSERT(ses != NULL);
00205 
00206         return ses;
00207 }
00208 
00209 static inline struct vvp_io *vvp_env_io(const struct lu_env *env)
00210 {
00211         return &vvp_env_session(env)->vs_ios;
00212 }

00217 struct vvp_object {
00218         struct cl_object_header vob_header;
00219         struct cl_object        vob_cl;
00220         struct inode           *vob_inode;
00221 
00227         atomic_t                vob_transient_pages;
00233         atomic_t                vob_mmap_cnt;
00234 
00245         unsigned int            vob_discard_page_warned:1;
00246 };
00247 
00251 struct vvp_page {
00252         struct cl_page_slice vpg_cl;
00253         unsigned        vpg_defer_uptodate:1,
00254                         vpg_ra_used:1;
00256         struct page     *vpg_page;
00257 };
00258 
00259 static inline struct vvp_page *cl2vvp_page(const struct cl_page_slice *slice)
00260 {
00261         return container_of(slice, struct vvp_page, vpg_cl);
00262 }
00263 
00264 static inline pgoff_t vvp_index(struct vvp_page *vpg)
00265 {
00266         return vpg->vpg_cl.cpl_index;
00267 }
00268 
00269 struct vvp_device {
00270         struct cl_device    vdv_cl;
00271         struct cl_device   *vdv_next;
00272 };
00273 
00274 struct vvp_lock {
00275         struct cl_lock_slice vlk_cl;
00276 };
00277 
00278 static inline struct lu_device *vvp2lu_dev(struct vvp_device *vdv)
00279 {
00280         return &vdv->vdv_cl.cd_lu_dev;
00281 }
00282 
00283 static inline struct vvp_device *lu2vvp_dev(const struct lu_device *d)
00284 {
00285         return container_of0(d, struct vvp_device, vdv_cl.cd_lu_dev);
00286 }
00287 
00288 static inline struct vvp_device *cl2vvp_dev(const struct cl_device *d)
00289 {
00290         return container_of0(d, struct vvp_device, vdv_cl);
00291 }
00292 
00293 static inline struct vvp_object *cl2vvp(const struct cl_object *obj)
00294 {
00295         return container_of0(obj, struct vvp_object, vob_cl);
00296 }
00297 
00298 static inline struct vvp_object *lu2vvp(const struct lu_object *obj)
00299 {
00300         return container_of0(obj, struct vvp_object, vob_cl.co_lu);
00301 }
00302 
00303 static inline struct inode *vvp_object_inode(const struct cl_object *obj)
00304 {
00305         return cl2vvp(obj)->vob_inode;
00306 }
00307 
00308 int vvp_object_invariant(const struct cl_object *obj);
00309 struct vvp_object *cl_inode2vvp(struct inode *inode);
00310 
00311 static inline struct page *cl2vm_page(const struct cl_page_slice *slice)
00312 {
00313         return cl2vvp_page(slice)->vpg_page;
00314 }
00315 
00316 static inline struct vvp_lock *cl2vvp_lock(const struct cl_lock_slice *slice)
00317 {
00318         return container_of(slice, struct vvp_lock, vlk_cl);

00321 #ifdef CONFIG_LUSTRE_DEBUG_EXPENSIVE_CHECK
00322 # define CLOBINVRNT(env, clob, expr)                                    \
00323         do {                                                            \
00324                 if (unlikely(!(expr))) {                                \
00325                         LU_OBJECT_DEBUG(D_ERROR, (env), &(clob)->co_lu, \
00326                                         #expr);                         \
00327                         LINVRNT(0);                                     \
00328                 }                                                       \
00329         } while (0)
00330 #else /* !CONFIG_LUSTRE_DEBUG_EXPENSIVE_CHECK */
00331 # define CLOBINVRNT(env, clob, expr)                                    \
00332         ((void)sizeof(env), (void)sizeof(clob), (void)sizeof !!(expr))
00333 #endif /* CONFIG_LUSTRE_DEBUG_EXPENSIVE_CHECK */
